name: dodge20
description:
A simple little game I made in 48 hours, I apologize for the bugs, and the insane decimal in the score, this is the second game i have ever made in unity, and the first was hardly a game. controls: look where you want to go and click, only works if you're completely still.

avoid rolling too much however, as rolling the dice might trigger a random effect, but if you don't roll, you'll likely get hit by falling meteors!
